content:
**Which graph shows a quadratic function with a domain of all real values of $x$?**

[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A quadratic function is graphed. The x and g of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The parabola has arrows at the edge of the graph on either end.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/621ded89e5a01b6d88b856ac5d73821e16df4830)

![A quadratic function is graphed. The x and g of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The parabola has an arrow at the right edge of the graph. There is a filled circle at the other edge of the graph at the point (negative 8, 9 point 5).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/c756389c7d4f26ae620ea2a956edddbdfdc24cbf)

![A quadratic function is graphed. The x and g of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. The parabola has an arrow at the left edge of the graph. There is a filled circle at the other edge of the graph at the point (10, 2 point 5).](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/30dd54cb05760c24855ec07a63e3e55e777d9329)

![A quadratic function is graphed. The x and g of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is a filled circle at the point (negative 8, 9 point 5). There is a filled circle at the point (10, 2 point 5). The parabola segment connects these two points.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/41b6025de05dd755289b7c3a78462e31e4938e0c)
